issue.title: C++: Add String support to Parquet I/O
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-214](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-214). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
String support is currently not implemented in the readers. Also we have here a slight difference between string type definition in Arrow (strings are non-primitive) and Parquet (strings are a primitive type).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-214?focusedCommentId=15356635) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Resolved by https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/93
